title: New: Ouisa Hound – Memorand / Our Wake
content:
After releasing his debut LP The Joy Eclectic, earlier this year (review coming soon I promise!), Ouisa Hound is back with two new cuts in the form of Memorand and Our Wake. Two tracks that may feature on his sophomore effort (titled Enclosures), they’re dark, brooding and wonderfully poetic, with Memorand twisting and turning like a rabid animal trapped amongst squalid confinements.

On the flip side, Our Wake is a post-rock inspired affair, again showcasing Ouisa Hounds‘ entirely unique ability to conjure up an atmosphere that is both menacing and veraciously beautiful. Check out Memorand above and Our Wake below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
